text: Costanzo de Sarnano, O.F.M. Conv. or Gasparo Torri (1531–1595) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 12 Jul 1587, he was consecrated bishop by Girolamo Bernerio, Bishop of Ascoli Piceno, with Giovanni Battista Albani, Titular Patriarch of Alexandria, and Agostino Quinzio, bishop of Korčula, serving as co-consecrators. ==Episcopal succession== While bishop, he was the principal consecrator of: ==References== Category:1531 births Category:1595 deaths Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church) Category:Conventual Franciscan bishops
title: Costanzo de Sarnano
